note.p: Education: BA (1744) MA (1748) BD and DD (1769), Balliol College, Oxford

Career: Rector, Dunstable, Bedfordshire (1753); Rector, Drayton Beauchamp, Oxfordshire with West Iddersley, Buckinghamshire (1786); Master of St Cross Hospital, Hampshire; Canon of Windsor (1758-1807)
Notes: Election certificate gives election date as 18 Jun 1778.
